name: Vault CLI
description: A feature which installs the Vault CLI.

version.description: The version of Vault CLI to install.

versionResolve.description: Whether to resolve the version automatically.

downloadUrlBase.description: The download URL to use for Vault CLI binaries.

downloadUrlPath.description: The download URL path to use for Vault CLI binaries.

versionsUrl.description: The URL to fetch the available Vault CLI versions from.
